valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 30 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: High pressure southwest of Iceland 1041, slow moving with little change by midday tomorrow. New high expected Hebrides 1040 by same time
